original_text:
G.R.O.W
Se ami coltivare l’orto e hai un buon pollice verde, la nuova divertente slot gratis G.R.O.W della software house Red 7 ti piacerà da impazzire!  Con una grafica in stile cartone animato e un’ambientazione agreste che anima lo sfondo, potrai far crescere i prodotti del tuo orto accanto alla deliziosa casetta in legno e trasformarti in un giardiniere provetto! Con 10 file di simboli fruttati, questo gioco dal mood green ti farà toccare il cielo per raggiungere, attraverso le piantine magiche di fagioli, 4 scrigni che contengono preziosi tesori. Sei pronto per indossare i guanti e fare un po’ di giardinaggio? Se la risposta è affermativa continua a leggere qui…
Come è stato organizzato il gameplay di G.R.O.W?
Puoi giocare a questa slot senza registrazione sia in modalità orizzontale che in quella in verticale, forse più pratica. Con 5 rulli e 50 linee di pagamento, questa slot online a tema giardinaggio può essere giocata a partire da 0,50 centesimi fino a 200 euro per giro su dispositivi desktop, mobili e tablet. Attraverso la crescita di simboli misteriosi, i fagioli magici, riceverai premi in denaro e giri gratuiti. Con un RTP del 96,47%, G.R.O.W è uno slot mediamente redditizia se accumuli anche i premi del forziere.
Quali sono i simboli vegetali principali?
La schermata è animata da una serie di simboli multicolori che includono:

Fragole, broccoli, favi e rape di basso valore
Cazzuole, guanti da giardinaggio, nebulizzatori spray e carriole di alto valore. Quest’ultima paga 0,8, 1,4 o 3 volte la puntata per 3, 4 o 5 in combinazione.
C’è anche un Peperoncino Wild che sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne i simboli scatter Bonus, Golden Bee e G.R.O.W. 3, 4 o 5 di essi in una linea di pagamento ti pagheranno rispettivamente 1, 1,6 o 4 volte la puntata. Le combinazioni vincenti si formano ottenendo 3 o più simboli corrispondenti da sinistra a destra a partire dalla bobina 1.

Quante sono le Funzionalità Bonus presenti nel gioco?
Sono complessivamente 4:

Simbolo dell’Ape d’Oro (Golden Been)- quando uno o più simboli dell’ape d’oro finiscono sul set di rulli, un importo in contanti supplementare verrà aggiunto al forziere corrispondente. Se l’ape atterra sui rulli 1 e 5, aumenterà il premio rispettivamente sul primo o sull’ultimo scrigno;
G.R.O.W e il Tesoro del Fagiolo Magico – quando questo simbolo atterra sui rulli, sia durante il gioco base che durante i giri gratuiti, il fertilizzante farà crescere la pianta di fagioli, lasciando dietro di sé la scia sui rulli. Ogni bobina avrà un fagiolo magico specifico, e quando lo farai crescere fino a 10 volte, si aprirà una cassa.
I 4 forzieri – ogni forziere nasconde un valore in denaro. Questo viene calcolato in base alla tua puntata attuale e alla media delle scommesse, oltre a qualsiasi importo assegnato dai simboli delle api d’oro. Una volta attivato, si ricomincia da capo;
Simbolo Bonus Misterioso: Vedrai anche un punto interrogativo che è il simbolo del mistero. All’inizio di ogni giro, i simboli misteriosi possono essere sostituiti casualmente con 1 degli altri simboli. Questa è chiamata la funzione Simbolo Mistero.

Nota Bene! Se la pianta di fagioli cresce più di 10 volte, la crescita extra viene aggiunta alla piantina successiva. Il premio in denaro negli scrigni è unico e cambia mentre giri le ruote. Esso viene calcolato in base alla media delle tue puntate per quel forziere – anche i simboli dell’Ape d’Oro aumentano il valore di 2 volte la puntata.
Come si vince alla slot G.R.O.W?
Per far crescere le piantine di fagioli, devi far atterrare i simboli scatter G.R.O.W sui rulli – se un simbolo G.R.O.W dovesse atterrare sui rulli 1, il germoglio sul rullo 1 comincerà a crescere, e così via. Se il simbolo G.R.O.W si trova sui rulli 2, 3 o 4, aumenta l’altezza dei fagiolini adiacenti ad esso. Inoltre, le icone Ape d’Oro e G.R.O.W fungono da simboli jolly. Una volta raggiunta la maturazione ottimale delle piantine, potrai ottenere grandi vincite finali e raccogliere i frutti di tanto lavoro!
Qual è l’andamento dei Giri Gratuiti in G.R.O.W?
La slot è dotata di una funzione Free Spins – questa viene giocata quando ottieni 3 o più simboli bonus sui rulli. Riceverai quindi 10 giri gratuiti. L’atterraggio di 3 simboli bonus nella funzione ti ricompenserà con 10 giri gratuiti aggiuntivi: nella funzione, appaiono solo sui rulli dispari 1, 3 e 5.
La mia opinione finale su G.R.O.W.
Questo gioco mi sembra più adatto ai giocatori amatoriali che ai veterani delle slot machine che popolano i nostri casinò AAMS/ADM. La varianza di vincita infatti non è altissima: puoi vincere un massimo di 150 volte la puntata se riempi tutte le posizioni della bobina con i simboli della carriola e 200 volte la scommessa se riesci a riempire i rulli con jolly. Le vincite più consistenti arriveranno dalla funzione Tesoro di Fagiolo Magico in cui i premi in denaro possono raggiungere 5.000 volte la giocata iniziale. Se ami le slot a tema cartoon ti consiglio di provare la slot gratis Honey Rush di Play’n Go, che ha temi simili ma vincite più interessanti o uno dei tanti nuovi titoli appena recensiti per te su Slotjava!

raw_translation.response:
G.R.O.W

If you have a green thumb and love gardening, the new and exciting free slot game G.R.O.W from Red 7 software will be your favorite! With a fun cartoon graphics and rustic background, you can grow your own garden next to the delightful wooden cottage and become a skilled gardener. With 10 reels of fruity symbols, this green-themed game will take you to new heights through the magic of bean plants, unlocking 4 chests containing precious treasures. Are you ready to put on your gloves and get some gardening done? If the answer is yes, keep reading here...

How is the gameplay of G.R.O.W set up?
You can play this slot without registration in both horizontal and vertical mode, the latter being more practical. With 5 reels and 50 paylines, this gardening-themed online slot can be played from 0.50 cents up to 200 euros per spin on desktop, mobile and tablet devices. By growing mysterious symbols, magic beans, you will receive cash prizes and free spins. With an RTP of 96.47%, G.R.O.W is a moderately profitable slot if you also accumulate the chest prizes.

What are the main vegetable symbols?
The screen is animated with a series of colorful symbols that include:

Strawberries, broccoli, beans and turnips of low value
Shovels, gardening gloves, sprayers and high-value wheelbarrows. The latter pays 0.8, 1.4 or 3 times the bet for 3, 4 or 5 in combination.
There is also a Wild Pepper symbol that replaces all symbols except the Bonus Scatter, Golden Bee and G.R.O.W symbols. 3, 4 or 5 of them on a payline will pay you 1, 1.6 or 4 times your bet, respectively. Winning combinations are formed by getting 3 or more corresponding symbols from left to right starting from reel 1.

How many bonus features are present in the game?
There are a total of 4:

Golden Bee symbol - when one or more Golden Bee symbols land on the reels, additional cash amounts will be added to the corresponding chest. If the bee lands on reels 1 and 5, the prize will increase either on the first or last chest;
G.R.O.W and the Magic Bean Treasure - when this symbol lands on the reels, both during the base game and during free spins, fertilizer will make the bean plant grow, leaving a trail behind on the reels. Each reel will have a specific magic bean, and when you grow it up to 10 times, a chest will open.
The 4 chests - each chest hides a cash value. This is calculated based on your current bet and the average of all bets, in addition to any amount assigned by Golden Bee symbols. Once activated, it starts over;
Mystery Bonus Symbol: You will also see a question mark, which is the symbol of the mystery. At the beginning of each spin, mystery symbols can randomly be replaced with one of the other symbols. This is called the Mystery Symbol function.

Note! If the bean plant grows more than 10 times, the extra growth is added to the next plant. The cash prize in the chests is unique and changes as you spin the reels. It is calculated based on your average bet for that chest - even Golden Bee symbols increase the value by 2 times the bet.

How do you win at G.R.O.W slot?
To grow the bean plants, you must land the G.R.O.W scatter symbols on the reels - if a G.R.O.W symbol lands on reel 1, the sprout on reel 1 will begin to grow, and so on. If the G.R.O.W symbol is on reels 2, 3 or 4, it increases the height of the adjacent bean stalks. In addition, the Golden Bee and G.R.O.W icons act as wild symbols. Once you have reached optimal plant maturity, you can get big final wins and reap the fruits of your hard work!

What is the trend of Free Spins in G.R.O.W?
The slot features a Free Spins function - this is played when you get 3 or more bonus symbols on the reels. You will then receive 10 free spins. Landing 3 bonus symbols in the function will reward you with an additional 10 free spins - in the function, they only appear on odd reels 1, 3 and 5.

My final opinion on G.R.O.W.
This game seems more suitable for amateur players than for veteran slot machine players who populate our AAMS/ADM casinos. The variance in winnings is not very high: you can win a maximum of 150 times your bet if you fill all reel positions with the wheelbarrow symbols, and 200 times the bet if you manage to fill the reels with wilds. The most substantial wins will come from the Magic Bean Treasure function, where cash prizes can reach 5,000 times the initial bet. If you love cartoon-themed slots, we recommend trying the free Honey Rush slot by Play'n Go, which has similar themes but more interesting wins or one of the many new titles just reviewed for you on Slotjava!

Simbolo dell’Ape d’Oro (Golden Been)- quando uno o più simboli dell’ape d’oro finiscono sul set di rulli, un importo in contanti supplementare verrà aggiunto al forziere corrispondente. Se l’ape atterra sui rulli 1 e 5, aumenterà il premio rispettivamente sul primo o sull’ultimo scrigno;
G.R.O.W e il Tesoro del Fagiolo Magico – quando questo simbolo atterra sui rulli, sia durante il gioco base che durante i giri gratuiti, il fertilizzante farà crescere la pianta di fagioli, lasciando dietro di sé la scia sui rulli. Ogni bobina avrà un fagiolo magico specifico, e quando lo farai crescere fino a 10 volte, si aprirà una cassa.
I 4 forzieri – ogni forziere nasconde un valore in denaro. Questo viene calcolato in base alla tua puntata attuale e alla media delle scommesse, oltre a qualsiasi importo assegnato dai simboli delle api d’oro. Una volta attivato, si ricomincia da capo;
Simbolo Bonus Misterioso: Vedrai anche un punto interrogativo che è il simbolo del mistero. All’inizio di ogni giro, i simboli misteriosi possono essere sostituiti casualmente con 1 degli altri simboli. Questa è chiamata la funzione Simbolo Mistero.

Nota Bene! Se la pianta di fagioli cresce più di 10 volte, la crescita extra viene aggiunta alla piantina successiva. Il premio in denaro negli scrigni è unico e cambia mentre giri le ruote. Esso viene calcolato in base alla media delle tue puntate per quel forziere – anche i simboli dell’Ape d’Oro aumentano il valore di 2 volte la puntata.
Come si vince alla slot G.R.O.W?
Per far crescere le piantine di fagioli, devi far atterrare i simboli scatter G.R.O.W sui rulli – se un simbolo G.R.O.W dovesse atterrare sui rulli 1, il germoglio sul rullo 1 comincerà a crescere, e così via. Se il simbolo G.R.O.W si trova sui rulli 2, 3 o 4, aumenta l’altezza dei fagiolini adiacenti ad esso. Inoltre, le icone Ape d’Oro e G.R.O.W fungono da simboli jolly. Una volta raggiunta la maturazione ottimale delle piantine, potrai ottenere grandi vincite finali e raccogliere i frutti di tanto lavoro!
Qual è l’andamento dei Giri Gratuiti in G.R.O.W?
La slot è dotata di una funzione Free Spins – questa viene giocata quando ottieni 3 o più simboli bonus sui rulli. Riceverai quindi 10 giri gratuiti. L’atterraggio di 3 simboli bonus nella funzione ti ricompenserà con 10 giri gratuiti aggiuntivi: nella funzione, appaiono solo sui rulli dispari 1, 3 e 5.
La mia opinione finale su G.R.O.W.
Questo gioco mi sembra più adatto ai giocatori amatoriali che ai veterani delle slot machine che popolano i nostri casinò AAMS/ADM. La varianza di vincita infatti non è altissima: puoi vincere un massimo di 150 volte la puntata se riempi tutte le posizioni della bobina con i simboli della carriola e 200 volte la scommessa se riesci a riempire i rulli con jolly. Le vincite più consistenti arriveranno dalla funzione Tesoro di Fagiolo Magico in cui i premi in denaro possono raggiungere 5.000 volte la giocata iniziale. G.R.O.W.

If you've got a green thumb and love gardening, you'll go wild for the new and fun free slot game G.R.O.W from Red 7 software. With cartoonish graphics and a rustic setting that brings the background to life, you can grow your garden next to the charming wooden house and become a pro gardener! With 10 rows of fruit symbols, this green-themed game will make you reach for the sky by reaching for 4 chests containing precious treasures through magic bean plants. Are you ready to put on your gloves and do some gardening? If the answer is yes, read on...

How is the gameplay organized in G.R.O.W?

You can play this slot without registration in both horizontal and vertical mode, perhaps more practical. With 5 reels and 50 paylines, this online gardening-themed slot can be played from 0.50 cents up to 200 euros per spin on desktop, mobile, and tablet devices. Through the growth of mysterious symbols, magic beans, you will receive cash prizes and free spins. With an RTP of 96.47%, G.R.O.W is a medium-paying slot if you also accumulate chest prizes.

What are the main plant symbols?

The screen is animated by a series of multicolored symbols including:

Low-value strawberries, broccoli, beans, and turnips
High-value trowels, gardening gloves, spray misters, and wheelbarrows. The latter pays out 0.8, 1.4, or 3 times the bet for 3, 4 or 5 in combination.
There is also a Wild Chili Pepper that replaces all symbols except Bonus scatter symbols, Golden Bee and G.R.O.W. 3, 4, or 5 of them on a payline will pay out 1, 1.6, or 4 times the bet respectively. Winning combinations are formed by getting 3 or more matching symbols from left to right starting from reel 1.

How many Bonus Features are present in the game?

There are 4 in total:

Golden Bee Symbol - when one or more Golden Bee symbols land on the reels, an additional cash amount will be added to the corresponding chest. If the bee lands on reels 1 and 5, the prize on the first or last chest respectively will increase.
G.R.O.W and the Treasure of the Magic Bean - when this symbol lands on the reels, both during the base game and during free spins, fertilizer will grow the bean plant, leaving a trail behind on the reels. Each reel will have a specific magic bean, and when you grow it up to 10 times, a chest will open.
The 4 chests - each chest hides a cash value. This is calculated based on your current bet and the average of all bets, plus any amount awarded by the Golden Bee symbols. Once activated, you start over again.
Mystery Bonus Symbol: You'll also see a question mark which is the Mystery symbol. At the start of each spin, mystery symbols can be randomly replaced with 1 of the other symbols. This is called the Mystery Symbol feature.

Note! If the bean plant grows more than 10 times, the extra growth is added to the next plant. The cash prize in the chests is unique and changes as you spin the reels. It is calculated based on the average of your bets for that chest - even Golden Bee symbols increase the value by 2 times the bet.

How do you win in the G.R.O.W slot?

To grow the bean plants, you need to land the G.R.O.W scatter symbols on the reels - if a G.R.O.W symbol lands on reel 1, the sprout on it will start to grow, and so on. If the G.R.O.W symbol is on reels 2, 3 or 4, it raises the height of adjacent bean sprouts. In addition, the Golden Bee and G.R.O.W icons act as wild symbols. Once the plants reach optimal maturity, you can get big final rewards and reap the fruits of your labor!

What is the trend of Free Spins in G.R.O.W?

The slot comes with a Free Spins feature - this is played when you get 3 or more bonus symbols on the reels. You will then receive 10 free spins. Landing 3 bonus symbols in the feature will reward you with an additional 10 free spins - they only appear on odd reels 1, 3, and 5 in the feature.

My final opinion on G.R.O.W.

This game seems more suited to amateur players than to veterans of slot machines that populate our AAMS/ADM casinos. The variance of winning is not very high: you can win a maximum of 150 times the bet if you fill all positions on the reel with wheelbarrow symbols and 200 times the bet if you manage to fill the reels with wild symbols. The most substantial rewards will come from the Magic Bean Treasure function, where cash prizes can reach 5,000 times the initial bet. If you love cartoon-themed slots, I recommend trying the free slot Honey Rush from Play'n Go, which has similar themes but more interesting rewards or one of the many new titles just reviewed for you on Slotjava!

Are you ready to put on your gloves and get some gardening done? If the answer is yes, keep reading here...

How is the gameplay of G.R.O.W set up?
You can play this slot without registration in both horizontal and vertical mode, the latter being more practical. With 5 reels and 50 paylines, this gardening-themed online slot can be played from 0.50 cents up to 200 euros per spin on desktop, mobile and tablet devices. By growing mysterious symbols, magic beans, you will receive cash prizes and free spins. With an RTP of 96.47%, G.R.O.W is a moderately profitable slot if you also accumulate the chest prizes.

What are the main vegetable symbols?
The screen is animated with a series of colorful symbols that include:

Strawberries, broccoli, beans and turnips of low value
Shovels, gardening gloves, sprayers and high-value wheelbarrows. The latter pays 0.8, 1.4 or 3 times the bet for 3, 4 or 5 in combination.
There is also a Wild Pepper symbol that replaces all symbols except the Bonus Scatter, Golden Bee and G.R.O.W symbols. 3, 4 or 5 of them on a payline will pay you 1, 1.6 or 4 times your bet, respectively. Winning combinations are formed by getting 3 or more corresponding symbols from left to right starting from reel 1.

How many bonus features are present in the game?
There are a total of 4:

Golden Bee symbol - when one or more Golden Bee symbols land on the reels, additional cash amounts will be added to the corresponding chest. If the bee lands on reels 1 and 5, the prize will increase either on the first or last chest;
G.R.O.W and the Magic Bean Treasure - when this symbol lands on the reels, both during the base game and during free spins, fertilizer will make the bean plant grow, leaving a trail behind on the reels. Each reel will have a specific magic bean, and when you grow it up to 10 times, a chest will open.
The 4 chests - each chest hides a cash value. This is calculated based on your current bet and the average of all bets, in addition to any amount assigned by Golden Bee symbols. Once activated, it starts over;
Mystery Bonus Symbol: You will also see a question mark, which is the symbol of the mystery. At the beginning of each spin, mystery symbols can randomly be replaced with one of the other symbols. This is called the Mystery Symbol function.

Note! If the bean plant grows more than 10 times, the extra growth is added to the next plant. The cash prize in the chests is unique and changes as you spin the reels. It is calculated based on your average bet for that chest - even Golden Bee symbols increase the value by 2 times the bet.

How do you win at G.R.O.W slot?
To grow the bean plants, you must land the G.R.O.W scatter symbols on the reels - if a G.R.O.W symbol lands on reel 1, the sprout on reel 1 will begin to grow, and so on. If the G.R.O.W symbol is on reels 2, 3 or 4, it increases the height of the adjacent bean stalks. In addition, the Golden Bee and G.R.O.W icons act as wild symbols. Once you have reached optimal plant maturity, you can get big final wins and reap the fruits of your hard work!

What is the trend of Free Spins in G.R.O.W?
The slot features a Free Spins function - this is played when you get 3 or more bonus symbols on the reels. You will then receive 10 free spins. Landing 3 bonus symbols in the function will reward you with an additional 10 free spins - in the function, they only appear on odd reels 1, 3 and 5.

My final opinion on G.R.O.W.
This game seems more suitable for amateur players than for veteran slot machine players who populate our AAMS/ADM casinos. The variance in winnings is not very high: you can win a maximum of 150 times your bet if you fill all reel positions with the wheelbarrow symbols, and 200 times the bet if you manage to fill the reels with wilds. The most substantial wins will come from the Magic Bean Treasure function, where cash prizes can reach 5,000 times the initial bet. If you love cartoon-themed slots, we recommend trying the free Honey Rush slot by Play'n Go, which has similar themes but more interesting wins or one of the many new titles just reviewed for you on Slotjava!

The 4 chests - each chest hides a cash value. This is calculated based on your current bet and the average of all bets, in addition to any amount assigned by Golden Bee symbols. Once activated, it starts over;
Mystery Bonus Symbol: You will also see a question mark, which is the symbol of the mystery. At the beginning of each spin, mystery symbols can randomly be replaced with one of the other symbols. This is called the Mystery Symbol function.

Note! If the bean plant grows more than 10 times, the extra growth is added to the next plant. The cash prize in the chests is unique and changes as you spin the reels. It is calculated based on your average bet for that chest - even Golden Bee symbols increase the value by 2 times the bet.

How do you win at G.R.O.W slot?
To grow the bean plants, you must land the G.R.O.W scatter symbols on the reels - if a G.R.O.W symbol lands on reel 1, the sprout on reel 1 will begin to grow, and so on. If the G.R.O.W symbol is on reels 2, 3 or 4, it increases the height of the adjacent bean stalks. In addition, the Golden Bee and G.R.O.W icons act as wild symbols. Once you have reached optimal plant maturity, you can get big final wins and reap the fruits of your hard work!

What is the trend of Free Spins in G.R.O.W?
The slot features a Free Spins function - this is played when you get 3 or more bonus symbols on the reels. You will then receive 10 free spins. Landing 3 bonus symbols in the function will reward you with an additional 10 free spins - in the function, they only appear on odd reels 1, 3 and 5.

My final opinion on G.R.O.W.
This game seems more suitable for amateur players than for veteran slot machine players who populate our AAMS/ADM casinos. The variance in winnings is not very high: you can win a maximum of 150 times your bet if you fill all reel positions with the wheelbarrow symbols, and 200 times the bet if you manage to fill the reels with wilds. The most substantial wins will come from the Magic Bean Treasure function, where cash prizes can reach 5,000 times the initial bet. If you love cartoon-themed slots, we recommend trying the free Honey Rush slot by Play'n Go, which has similar themes but more interesting wins or one of the many new titles just reviewed for you on Slotjava!
